model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Buyer, Seller

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Joey The user class that builds a USer object. The user object is the super class for the user types in the system. This class implements serializable (Decorator Pattern)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
